modName: Emperor's Will and Stormlord Armors STANDALONE
summary: Standalone Emperor's Will and Stormlord Armors
descriptionHtml:
The Emperor's Will and Stormlord Armors... works of art! My only complaint was that they were replacers, so I made them standalone... mainly due to the fact that I like their vanilla armors, too. So I wanted to keep them.

Both armors are worn by only one man, the respective generals of each side of the civil war, General Tullius and Galmar Stone-Fist. I didn't put the Stormlord on Ulfric because I like his vanilla outfit. (Hey, I don't like the guy, personally... but I gotta admit, he's a snazzy dresser.)

Now I know what you're probably going to ask: "If General Tullius' vanilla armor was only worn by him, then why make the Emperor's Will Armor standalone anyway?" Good point!

So how did I keep the vanilla armor in the game? I gave it to the Legates! Now Legate Rikke and her equals in rank wear General Tullius' vanilla armor, which I renamed the Imperial Legate's Armor. Now they can distinguish themselves from the lower officers in the Legion.

And if you want these armors for yourself, you can buy them from Beirand, along with the General's weapons Emperor's Wrath and Emperor's Great Wrath.

As for the Stormlord Armor... it, too, no longer replaces the Stormcloak Officer's Armor, so all the Stormblades will still be wearing the vanilla armor. You can also buy these armors from Oengul War-Anvil.

I also took the liberty of adding the regular armors and weapons to the sales inventories of their respective blacksmiths. I never really understood why Beirand would tell you that if you got your armor destroyed, that you have to buy a new one like everyone else since their wasn't any Imperial armors in his inventory. So, I fixed that.

BTW, if you want the Legate's Armor to look like it does in the pics, you'll have to download the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34321/?]Virtus Imperii - Imperial Gear Re-mastered[/url]. The Stormcloak Officer's, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45692/?]aMidianBorn stormcloak officer armour[/url].

Also, the two armors are in separate mods. So if you want them both, you have to download them separately.

Many thanks to gechbal for making these awesome armors and letting me release these mods.

Enjoy.

Get gechbal's original mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46672/?]here[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40216/?]here[/url].

UPDATE: People kept asking for them, so I made craftable versions. The requirements for them are the same as the original mods.

UPDATE AGAIN: I fixed the smithing lists. Certain parts were appearing in different lists at the forge. So now, all the Emperor's Will parts are under Imperial, and all the Stormlord parts are under Miscellaneous.

YET ANOTHER UPDATE: Had to fix the stats of the armors. Now they're equivalent to gechbal's original stats.

ONCE AGAIN: Made Emperor's Wrath and Emperor's Great Wrath temperable.
author: gechbal and CaptainRC
